POSITION SUMMARY: Are you a tech-savvy student with a strong understanding of IT environments, testing, and deployments? This position is designed for individuals with IT experience who want to gain hands-on expertise in lab management, configuration control, and deployment processes. In the role you will be responsible for: YOUR ROLE IN THE GAME: • Application & Patch Deployment - Coordinate the deployment of applications and patches, ensuring proper validation and configuration alignment before release to the testing group. • Lab Environment Management - Oversee lab components, maintain configurations, and ensure the IT environment is controlled and optimized for testing. • Testing Coordination - Schedule and manage testing activities based on environment knowledge and requirements. • Configuration & Change Management - Ensure proper setup and configuration of lab infrastructure, including storage, servers, networks, and security settings. • Lab Control & Administration - Maintain authority over lab components, allowing structured and efficient testing operations. • Troubleshooting & Validation - Monitor the lab environment, identify issues, and apply fixes to maintain stability and performance.
